Name: DenseLayer

Properties.Name: size
Properties.Description: The number of neurons in the layer

Properties.Name: activationKey
Properties.Description: The key corresponding to the selected activation function.

Properties.Name: weights
Properties.Description: The weights of the layer arranged in a matrix of shape=[inputSize,size].

Properties.Name: biases
Properties.Description: The biases of the layer arranged in a matrix of shape=[size].

Properties.Name: inputSize
Properties.Description: Number of floating point inputs to the layer.

Functions.Name: build
Functions.Description: Creates matrices mapping input size to output size. Requires a set connection of output shape [None].

Functions.Name: newLayer

MandatoryArgs.Name: layerSize
MandatoryArgs.Description: The number of neurons in the layer

MandatoryArgs.Name: activationFunction
MandatoryArgs.Description: Key to activation function. One of: 'relu', 'linear', 'sigmoid', or 'tanh'.

Functions.Description: Creates a new layer instead of importing the layer.

Functions.Name: getTrainableVariables
Functions.Description: returns a list of the trainable tf.Variables in the layer.

Functions.name: exportLayer

MandatoryArgs.Name: path
MandatoryArgs.Description: Path the network is being saved to.

MandatoryArgs.Name: subdir
MandatoryArgs.Description: Subdirectory within path where this layer is being saved to.

Functions.Description: Saves this layer to a specified folder. Saves three files: [path]/[subdir]/mat.weights, [path]/[subdir]:mat.biases, [path]/[subdir]/hyper.txt  .

Functions.name: importLayer

MandatoryArgs.Name: path
MandatoryArgs.Description: Path the network is being saved to.

MandatoryArgs.Name: subdir
MandatoryArgs.Description: Subdirectory within path where this layer is being saved to.

Functions.Description: Loads this layer from a specified folder. Requires three files: [path]/[subdir]/mat.weights, [path]/[subdir]:mat.biases, [path]/[subdir]/hyper.txt  .

Notes: Can only connect to a single Node
